amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in House Report 115-259 to provide for a one percent across the board cut to the discretionary spending levels in Division D of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 285, 1 Present (Roll no. 428).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 285, 1 Present (Roll no. 428).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
